attributes.action: Congolese who live and work in UK, no support from British Media TV& Newpapers?
attributes.additional_details:
1. London 16/02/2012 .The Congolese community in Britain march through London in protest at the DR Congo government and the genocide that has taken place in their country. evidence: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y1_a07IGWSw

2. 2011 London UK. Evidence:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c-RnRTkte2s 
3. DR Congo Election March in London . evidence:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qvdhQvFtPcE
attributes.background: As Human Rights, Freedom and Democracy. Congolese Community, who live and work in UK, most of them are British Citizens, When  opposing or demonstrations for R.D.Congo, British Medias never give them any supports. We make ours contribution Tax and National Insurance numbers as others communities.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament do not control who appears on television or in other forms of media.

We also can't accept petitions from organisations, only from named individuals.
